text:
e="preserve">Elmont is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) located in northwestern Hempstead in Nassau County, New York, United States, along its border with the borough of Queens in New York City.
It is a suburban bedroom community located on Long Island. The population was 33,198 at the 2010 census. It is known for hosting the Belmont Stakes, a horse racing competition.
